description: Test data for Customer management in Time module

CUST_TC01.test_name: Add customer with valid name and description

test_data.description: Leading software development company specializing in enterprise solutions

CUST_TC01.expected_result: Success message displayed and customer appears in list

CUST_TC02.test_name: Add customer with name only (empty description)
CUST_TC02.expected_result: Success message displayed, description is optional

CUST_TC03.expected_result: Form is not submitted, Required error displayed

CUST_TC04.test_name: Add customer with name exceeding 50 characters
CUST_TC04.expected_result: Validation error or input truncated to 50 characters
CUST_TC04.notes: Name is exactly 51 characters to exceed the 50 char limit

CUST_TC05.expected_result: Error message indicating customer name already exists
CUST_TC05.notes: This test requires CUST_TC01 to be executed first to create the initial customer

CUST_TC06.test_name: Add customer with special characters in name
CUST_TC06.expected_result: Discover actual system behavior for special characters
CUST_TC06.notes: Exploratory test to determine if system accepts, rejects, or escapes special chars like <, >, &

CUST_TC07.test_name: Add customer with name at boundary (exactly 50 chars)

test_data.description: Boundary test for maximum allowed length

CUST_TC07.expected_result: Success - customer created with exactly 50 characters
CUST_TC07.notes: Name is exactly 50 characters - testing the boundary condition

CUST_TC08.test_name: Add customer with various special characters
CUST_TC08.expected_result: Discover how system handles various special characters
CUST_TC08.notes: Additional discovery test for special characters

CUST_TC09.expected_result: Discover if system trims spaces or accepts them as-is

CUST_TC10.test_name: Add customer with numeric name only
CUST_TC10.expected_result: Discover if numeric-only names are accepted

prerequisites.note: Some test cases depend on others. TC05 requires TC01 to be executed first.
